content: knitted hat in drops air the piece is worked with multi-coloured pattern see the something about holly cardigan pattern here 1 pattern ai-451 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s/m- m/l fits head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50 g colour 02 wheat 50-50 g colour 12 moss green 50-50 g colour 32 blush 50-50 g colour 44 crimson red **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/245-18-something-about-holly-cardigan
